name: streamtube
description: stream local video from your pc to the internet.

scripts.build: browserify public/js/index.js -o public/js/indexBundle.js && browserify public/js/remote.js -o public/js/remoteBundle.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install && npm run build

author: Godwin Agedah
